page.title: 17Longworth Farm
page.content: The farm is over 4oo years old and has 6oo acres. Grass,wheat and barley are grown on the farm. There are no animals kept. The farmer has 5 barns on the farm. He keeps wheat stored there. There are three people who work on the farm. The busiest time of year is mid June until the end of October and the least busy time is January. The biggest change on the farm in the last few years is the increase in productivity. The farmer likes to work when it isn't too hot or too cold. He has worked on the farm for 14 years and he likes to sit down in the evening.His family also keep horses and dogs.
